channel-type.label: Delivery
channel-type.description: The total amount of electricity used in kWh.

channel-type.label: Delivery tariff 0
channel-type.description: The total amount of electricity used for tariff 0 in kWh.

channel-type.label: Delivery tariff 1
channel-type.description: The total amount of electricity used for tariff 1 in kWh.

channel-type.label: Delivery tariff 2
channel-type.description: The total amount of electricity used for tariff 2 in kWh.

channel-type.label: Delivery tariff 0
channel-type.description: The total amount of electricity used for tariff 0 in kWh(anti fraud).

channel-type.label: Delivery tariff 1
channel-type.description: The total amount of electricity(kWh) used for tariff 1 in kWh(anti fraud).

channel-type.label: Delivery tariff 2
channel-type.description: The total amount of electricity(kWh) used for tariff 2 in kWh(anti fraud).

channel-type.label: Production tariff 0
channel-type.description: The total amount of electricity(kWh) produced for tariff 0 in kWh.

channel-type.label: Production tariff 1
channel-type.description: The total amount of electricity(kWh) produced for tariff 1 in kWh.

channel-type.label: Production tariff 2
channel-type.description: The total amount of electricity(kWh) produced for tariff 2 in kWh.

channel-type.label: Tariff Indicator
channel-type.description: The current tariff indicator.

channel-type.description: The aggrate active import power in W.

channel-type.description: The current power delivery in kW.

channel-type.description: The actual threshold in A.

channel-type.description: The actual threshold in kW.

channel-type.description: The switch position.

channel-type.label: Number of power failures
channel-type.description: The number of power failures.

channel-type.label: Number of long power failures
channel-type.description: The number of long power failures.

channel-type.label: Power failure log entries
channel-type.description: Number of log entries.

channel-type.label: Power failure end
channel-type.description: Timestamp when the power failure ended. There can be multiple log entries. Each entry has it's own channel (emeter_power_failure_log_timestamp*x*, *x* = 0 - 9)

channel-type.label: Power failure duration
channel-type.description: Duration of the power failure in seconds. Each entry has it's own channel (emeter_power_failure_log_duration*x*, *x* = 0 - 9)
